product_name: Lightload Towels Mini Towel - 12" x 12" - Package of 2
long_description: Lightload Towels mini towels slip easily into a shirt pocket, backpack pocket or car glove compartment for convenient access wherever, whenever. Once removed from packaging, towels expand to 12 x 12 in., the perfect size for use by the campsite or around the house. Each towel comes packed in waterproof packaging that compresses the towel down to 2 in. in diameter by 0.25 in. thick. Super-absorbent viscose fiber absorbs up to 10 times its weight; material is more absorbent than cotton. Fast-drying material wicks moisture and is reusable; once open, the towel will not fit back into original packaging. Each towel weighs just 0.25 oz. In a pinch, the towels can be used as fire starter. Available in assorted colors; sorry, we can't handpick a color for you. Lightload Towels mini towels are machine washable. Package of 2.
short_description: Lightload Towels mini towels slip easily into a shirt pocket, backpack pocket or car glove compartment for convenient access wherever, whenever.
